hypothesis_content.title: Extreme Sentiment Divergence Reversal
hypothesis_content.statement: When social media sentiment (weighted average of Crypto Twitter, Reddit, Telegram) reaches extreme bearish levels (≤20th percentile) while on-chain metrics (NUPL, MVRV) show accumulation by large holders (>10k BTC), a contrarian long position will outperform over the next 14 trading days as retail panic selling meets institutional buying.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Retail sentiment often lags on-chain smart money flows. When large holders accumulate during panic, they provide price support that eventually leads to reversals as selling pressure diminishes. This divergence creates alpha opportunities before sentiment catches up.
entry_conditions: Large holder net flow (wallets >10k BTC) positive for 3+ consecutive days

exit_conditions.take_profit: 12% gain OR sentiment returns to 50th percentile
exit_conditions.stop_loss: 7% loss OR large holders begin net selling

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If large holder accumulation fails to provide price support and selling continues despite extreme bearish sentiment, indicating deeper structural issues.
